goal: Research the beliefs and history of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, produce a structured report, and generate a downloadable PDF using Python.
steps: Conduct comprehensive research on the history and beliefs of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
Compile the findings into a structured report format.
Use Python and an appropriate library, such as fpdf or reportlab, to create a PDF from the report.
Ensure the PDF includes all sections: history, beliefs, cultural practices, demographics, and contemporary issues.
Test the PDF generation to confirm that it downloads correctly.
Finalize the report and ensure accuracy and clarity.
acceptance: The report meets academic standards for research quality and depth.
The PDF generated is formatted correctly and includes all findings.
The content accurately reflects the beliefs and history of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
